Name: DailyHeartlandsNews/ExoShowcase
Body: Draedon hosted a chilling demonstration of the 'Exo Overheated' armor's capabilities, reducing a captured Reaper Shark to vapor in seconds. The armor's core reportedly 'screams like a dying star' when active. Attendees noted its resemblance to the Exo Mechs' design, prompting speculation about their shared origins. A lab assistant whispered: 'They're not suits. They're coffins.' We'll keep you updated as this story develops.
